      • searchKeywordFromFAQ

        protected java.lang.String searchKeywordFromFAQ(java.lang.String input_text)
        Return keywords available in FAQ table that match one or more keywords in the input
        Parameters:
        input_text - A keyword that may exist in FAQ table
        Returns:
        String of all matched answers concatenated and separated by '; '

                      throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                             java.sql.SQLException
        Gets the discount rate of input tour offering, if any
        Parameters:
        offerId - 15-character offerId used in booking table ([tourid][offerid])
        Returns:
        1 if no discount, some number less than 1 otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getStaffId

        protected java.lang.String getStaffId()
        get all staff's id and return them
        Returns:
        String containing all userIds of staffs, delimited by semicolon (;)

      • addStaff

        protected void addStaff(java.lang.String userId)
        Add a user as Staff. The staff would receive every unanswered question and the customer's userId. So that the staff can answer it later. Staffs can also access the database to view all questions apart from registering as a Staff.
        Parameters:
        userId - The userId of the user that would be added as staff.

      • getRecommendation

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getRecommendation(java.lang.String userId)
                                                           throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                  java.sql.SQLException
        This method take userId as input, returns a tour record as String array to recommend to the user.
        Parameters:
        userId - This is used to find a proper recommendation for the specific user
        Returns:
        ArrayList(String) This contains the information of the tour recommended to that user.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • searchBookingById

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> searchBookingById(java.lang.String userId)
                                                                                throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                                       java.sql.SQLException
        This method takes userId as input and returns a 2D array as this userId's booking record in database.
        Parameters:
        userId - This is the userId that is used to find bookings in database
        Returns:
        ArrayList(ArrayList(String)) Return an array of records, each record is a String array.
